Sentencas: The structure, phase stability, and electrical properties of BaCe1-xYxO3-delta (x = 0-0.4) in humidity air and CO2 atmosphere are investigated.
Titulo: Phase stability and conductivity of Ba1-ySryCe1-xYxO3-δ solid oxide fuel cell electrolyte

Sentencas: XRD results indicate that the BaCe0.9Y0.1O3-delta sample has asymmetric cubic structure, and its phase changes to tetragonal as the Y3+ doping amount increases to 20 mol%.
Titulo: Phase stability and conductivity of Ba1-ySryCe1-xYxO3-δ solid oxide fuel cell electrolyte

Sentencas: The conductivity of BaCe1-xYxO3-delta increases with temperature, and it depends on the amount of yttrium doping and the atmosphere.
Titulo: Phase stability and conductivity of Ba1-ySryCe1-xYxO3-δ solid oxide fuel cell electrolyte

Sentencas: BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-delta exhibits the highest conductivity of 0.026 S cm(-1) at 750 degrees C.
Titulo: Phase stability and conductivity of Ba1-ySryCe1-xYxO3-δ solid oxide fuel cell electrolyte

Sentencas: The activation energy for conductivity depends on yttrium doping amount and temperature.
Titulo: Phase stability and conductivity of Ba1-ySryCe1-xYxO3-δ solid oxide fuel cell electrolyte

Sentencas: The conductivity of BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-delta is 0.025 S cm(-1) in CO2 atmosphere at 750 degrees C which is 3.8% lower than that in air due to reactions with CO2 and BaCO3 and the CeO2 impure phases formed.
Titulo: Phase stability and conductivity of Ba1-ySryCe1-xYxO3-δ solid oxide fuel cell electrolyte

Sentencas: The structure of BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-delta is unstable in water and decomposes to Ba(OH)(2) and CeO2 phases.
Titulo: Phase stability and conductivity of Ba1-ySryCe1-xYxO3-δ solid oxide fuel cell electrolyte

Sentencas: It is found that the activation energy of samples in CO2 atmosphere is higher than that of sample in air.
Titulo: Phase stability and conductivity of Ba1-ySryCe1-xYxO3-δ solid oxide fuel cell electrolyte

Sentencas: Sr-doped Ba1-ySryCe0.8Y0.2O3-delta (y = 0-0.2) is prepared to improve the phase stability of BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-delta in water.
Titulo: Phase stability and conductivity of Ba1-ySryCe1-xYxO3-δ solid oxide fuel cell electrolyte

Sentencas: The conductivity of Ba0.9Sr0.1Ce0.8Y0.2O3-delta is 0.023 S cm(-1) at 750 degrees C which was 11% lower than that of BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-delta, however, the phase stability of Ba0.9Sr0.1Ce0.8Y0.2O3-delta is much better than that of BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-delta in water.
Titulo: Phase stability and conductivity of Ba1-ySryCe1-xYxO3-δ solid oxide fuel cell electrolyte
Phase stability and conductivity of Ba1-ySryCe1-xYxO3-δ solid oxide fuel cell electrolyte
Phase stability and conductivity of Ba1-ySryCe1-xYxO3-δ solid oxide fuel cell electrolyte
